text: -ryaqj~jiyaqM nAvi#ndaqn tE da#r.SapUrNamAqsAva#punaqn tau vA Eqtau pUqtau mEddhyauq yad-da#r.SapUrNamAqsau ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAn da#r.SapUrNamAqsau yaja#tE pUqtAvEqvainauq mEddhyau# yajatEq nAmA#vAqsyA#yAM ca paurNamAqsyAM caq striya-mupE#yAqdya- du#pEqyAnniri#ndriyaH syAqt sOma#syaq vai rAj~jO$&rddhamAqsasyaq rAtra#yaqH patna#ya Asaqn tAsA#mamAvAqsyA$M ca paurNamAqsIM caq nOpaiqt - [  ]  36
